tags: None
review:
The clinic's atmosphere was warm and welcoming, immediately putting us at ease during what can be an emotionally charged experience. The staff, from reception to nursing to the brilliant medical team, were not only highly professional but also genuinely empathetic. They understood the emotional toll that infertility takes on couples and provided a safe space for us to share our concerns and fears.

Our journey began with a thorough examination and an in-depth discussion about our medical history. Dr. Chinmayee took the time to explain every aspect of the fertility treatments available to us, tailoring her approach to our unique situation. This personalized care was a refreshing change from previous experiences where we often felt like just another case.

One of the standout features of Feminova was her commitment to transparency. We were informed about the potential risks and success rates of each procedure, enabling us to make informed decisions about our fertility treatment. This open communication fostered trust and allowed us to feel in control of our journey. 

In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr.Chinmayee to anyone on a similar journey. The combination of expertise, compassion, and a patient-centric approach makes this clinic stand out in the realm of fertility treatments. Our experience here has been nothing short of transformative, and for that, we are forever grateful!

tags: None
review:
I had consulted Dr.Chinmayee Sukhavasi for my mother. Mother was suffering from sever stomachache and excessive bleeding during the periods. I had visited the doctor at her clinic Feminova. 

She had immense patience, she heard all the things from and explained in the issue clearly. Advised for few tests following the procedure.

Based on the reports she even suggests is there any chance of medical management or we need to go surgery.

In my mother case, both the options were possible so Doctor explained and left the discussion on us. We went ahead for Hysterectomy surgery.

Surgery took place in Ankura Gachibowli, everything went very smooth and my mother is doing fine. She is also doing very good now. 

Dr.Chinmayee Sukhavasi was always available over the call if needed.

I will recommend Dr. Chinmayee Sukhavasi.

review: We have booked an appointment considering the positive reviews about the clinic and the doctor and here is my experience with the clinic.The management of the clinic is highly unprofessional and ignorant. We have received 5-6 calls asking us to reschedule the appointment considering the lunch time of the doctor and later got a call to reschedule it again because the doctor had to  go for a surgery. Finally, after cancelling all our plans to accomodate these impromptu requests - voila! the doctor becomes available and we get another call to come in 15-30 mins.Time management folks! The least that is expected from a clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My experience with the IVF specialist dr. Chinmayee Sukhavasi was very positive. She provided excellent care and guidance throughout the process. What I really liked about this centre is that they are very organised. They don’t make you wait for procedures which is usually the practice outside. Other clinics we were called for embryo transfer at 9am and my wife started spotting in the noon and the transfer was done at 6pm. This is a very ethical and patient focused centre. I highly recommend Dr. Chinmayee and Feminova Fertility Clinic as the best fertility clinic in Hyderabad. Kudos to the team !
